long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Quras Wallet in your browser


QurasMask is an extension wallet of Quras blockchain for the distributed application and Dapps in your browser.


This extension uses "quras-js" library from npm server and using this library it is possible to access to blockchain.


QurasMask let users create and manage the wallet in Quras blockchain.


You can always check the source code of QurasMask the way you do any Chrome extension, or view the source code on Github:
https://github.com/quras-official/QurasMask


QurasMask supports the below functions.
● Creating wallet
● Send/Receive assets
● Deploying tokens
● Issue tokens
● Get balance/history
● Swap tokens
...
